page.description: Specifies if data can be edited.

item.name: Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for <OBJECT> use either the <FORM> pointer or the name of the form)

section.description: The <OBJECT>.ALLOW_CHANGE() method sets the Allow Changes setting for a layout. However, the user can press the F3 key or select the Allow Edits menu entry to allow editing.

section.title: Example

Note : Alternatively, you can also set a form's RESTRICT_CHANGE and RESTRICT_ENTER properties. Note : To find out what the status is of a form's Allow Changes setting, use the ALLOW_EDITING() function.
